author: arjoon3307
content: The proposal for blob market uses an exponential function to achieve the target and I understand why. Buy why isn't it the same for the gas target on the execution layer? I thought it was due to floating point execution issues?

author: pietjepuk
content: The (fake) exponential function is also integer math

author: pietjepuk
content: And as far as, "why not on the EL": I think it was already known at the time not to be perfect, but also that linear was probably good enough. Who knows, if it works well/better on the data gas market, the "normal" gas market will get the same implementation. That said, the latter has a lot more pressing issues (compute + data being priced with the same gas, etc).
